downloadZip.description: Button to download selected images as ZIP

checkAll.description: Button text when not all images are checked

uncheckAll.description: Button text when all images are checked

errorFetchingImages.message: Error fetching images. Please try again.
errorFetchingImages.description: Error message when unable to fetch images

noImagesSelected.message: No images selected. Please select at least one image.
noImagesSelected.description: Error message when no images are selected for download

errorDownloadingImage.description: Error message when an image fails to download
